name: CAREPLAN_TEMP_INFO
description: This table contains the basic no-add single items of Care plan template (LCE) records like record name, status, type, display name, etc.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the care plan template record.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the care plan template record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the care plan template record in Hyperspace.
